title: alinamorse
author: alinamorse
content: Providing the content related to the user is the only way to make them stay in the app. According to the user interest choosing the content appearing in the user interaction section is highly possible with AI. Instant way for providing the users with quizzes, interactive content related to the subject they are learning.Â  A quick chatbot integration to it, a way to gain knowledge in detail. By assessment method, examining makes them to know about the amount of knowledge obtained by them in the field. This is the reason why entrepreneurs are looking forward for elearning app development and integrating generative AI into it. Reach out to Maticz Technologies for building your own customized e learning apps.
